Title: A first look at the new Copilot agents panel on GitHub
Author: GitHub
Description:
Say goodbye to context switching. GitHub Copilot is now integrated directly into github.com with the new agents panel. This browser-native setup gives Copilot full context of your repository, issues, and pull requests, so you can run tasks without ever leaving the web interface.

#GitHubCopilot #AI #Developer
